answers.answer:
To enroll your child in primary education in Romania, you will typically need the following documents:

* Birth certificate (certificat de naștere)
* Passport-sized photo of the child
* Proof of residence in the area where the school is located (usually an electricity or water bill with your name on it)

It's important to note that these requirements may vary depending on the specific school and district, so it would be best to contact the local school administration for more accurate information. Additionally, there might be other documents needed based on each school's individual policies.
